  • pydicom.charset.decode

pydicom.charset.decodeÂ¶

pydicom.charset.decode(data_element, dicom_character_set)[source]Â¶

Apply the DICOM character encoding to a data element

Deprecated since version 1.4: This function is deprecated, use decode_element() instead.

Parameters

  • data_element (dataelem.DataElement) â The DataElement instance containing an encoded byte string value to decode.

  • dicom_character_set (str or list of str or None) â The value of (0008,0005) Specific Character Set, which may be a single value, a multiple value (code extension), or may also be '' or None, in which case 'ISO_IR 6' will be used.
